forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours before dawn, a veil of clouds lingers over Downtown San Francisco, promising a softened start to the day with temperatures settling around 54 degrees. The gentle southwest winds whisper through the streets, carrying with them a sense of calm both familiar and inviting. As the sun ascends, it will chase away the clouds, revealing a day bathed in muted sunlight, perfect for meandering through the city's storied streets. The afternoon will see a slight dip in temperature, falling to about 60, a gentle reminder of the cool embrace characteristic of this coastal city.

The air is likely to remain crisp, and while there may be hints of the coastal marine layer, generally, visibility should be clear enough to admire the iconic skyline from any vantage point. Dress in layers, opting for a light jacket against the fresh breeze, as the interplay of warmth from the sun and cool air can shift unexpectedly. As you contemplate the day ahead, consider a stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the city's lesser-known parks—an opportunity to savor a leisurely morning coffee while watching the world wake. A quiet exploration of the local art scene or a visit to an intriguing bookstore may also be just the ticket, offering a delightful blend of leisure and culture suitable for these serene conditions.
